attributes.action: Foreigners with brp can use e gate when going through British border control
attributes.additional_details: Foreign nationals with brp are residents of the UK and do not have a problem with immigration intentions, so there is no need to undergo manual checks. And some countries have taken similar effective measures, such as Japan, us and South Korea
attributes.background: It is not good that there are long queues at UK border control, especially Heathrow, where non-EU foreigners often have to queue for more than two hours

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638751
